props.name: nbPhotos
props.description: The number of photos to be displayed at the same time

props.name: apikey
props.description: The Google Drive API key having access right on the given folder

props.name: duration
props.description: The duration of photo exposition in ms. A new set of photo will be displayed each `duration` ms.

props.name: columns
props.description: The number of columns to be displayed.
